p: Wisdom, A, E C McWilliam Leitch, E Gaunt, H Harvala, and P Simmonds. 2009. “Screening Respiratory Samples for Detection of Human Rhinoviruses (HRVs) and Enteroviruses: Comprehensive VP4-VP2 Typing Reveals High Incidence and Genetic Diversity of HRV Species C.” Journal of Clinical Microbiology 47 (12): 3958 LP-3967. https://doi.org/10.1128/JCM.00993-09.
